title: Modeling formation and transport of clusters at high temperature and pressure gradients by implying partial chemical equilibrium
summary:
A theoretical approach to describing transport of an entire ensemble of
clusters with different sizes as a single species in gas has been developed.
The major assumption is an existence of local partial chemical equilibrium
between the clusters. It is shown that thermal diffusion emerges in the
collective description as a significant factor even if it is negligible when
transport of the original molecular species is considered. Analytical
expressions for the effective diffusion and thermal diffusion coefficients at
temperature, pressure, and chemical composition gradients have been derived.
The theory has been applied to a technology of H2S conversion in a centrifugal
plasma-chemical reactor and has made it possible to account for sulfur clusters
in numerical process modeling.

AI.tldr: 开发了一种理论方法，将不同尺寸的团簇集合作为单一物种在气体中输运进行描述。主要假设是团簇之间存在局部部分化学平衡。研究发现，即使在原始分子物种输运中热扩散可忽略，在集体描述中热扩散也会成为重要因素。推导了有效扩散和热扩散系数的解析表达式，并应用于离心等离子化学反应器中的H2S转化技术。
AI.motivation: 为了描述不同尺寸团簇集合在气体中的输运行为，将其作为单一物种处理，以简化复杂系统的建模过程。
AI.method: 基于团簇间存在局部部分化学平衡的假设，开发理论方法推导有效扩散和热扩散系数的解析表达式。
AI.result: 热扩散在集体描述中成为显著因素，即使原始分子输运中可忽略。获得了温度、压力和化学组成梯度下的有效扩散和热扩散系数表达式。
AI.conclusion: 该理论成功应用于H2S转化技术，使数值过程建模中能够考虑硫团簇的影响，为复杂反应系统的输运行为提供了新的描述框架。

title: Quantum Tunnelling Across Hydrogen Bonds: Proton--Deuteron Isotope Effects from a Cornell-Type Potential Model
comment: 10 pages,4 figures and submitted to Journal of Molecular Liquids
summary:
Hydrogen bonds play a pivotal role in chemistry, biology, and
condensed-matter physics, where quantum tunnelling can strongly influence
structure and dynamics. Isotope substitution (H $\rightarrow$ D) provides a
sensitive probe of such tunnelling, but theoretical descriptions often rely on
purely numerical models or simplified potentials that obscure physical
interpretation. Here we employ a Cornell-type potential combined with a
double-well Schr\"odinger approach to investigate proton and deuteron
tunnelling across hydrogen bonds. The model yields semi-analytical
wavefunctions and tunnelling splittings that transparently capture
isotope-dependent quantum effects. We present scaling behaviour of tunnelling
splittings with isotope mass, discuss the influence of barrier width and
curvature, and compare model trends with representative experimental and
computational results. Beyond hydrogen bonding, the framework provides a
general methodology for modelling tunnelling in double-well systems relevant to
spectroscopy, enzymatic catalysis, and materials applications.

AI.tldr: 使用Cornell型势能和双阱薛定谔方法研究氢键中的质子和氘核隧穿，提供半解析波函数和隧穿分裂，揭示同位素依赖的量子效应。
AI.motivation: 氢键在化学、生物和凝聚态物理中至关重要，量子隧穿强烈影响其结构和动力学。同位素取代(H→D)是探测隧穿的灵敏方法，但现有理论描述常依赖纯数值模型或简化势能，缺乏物理解释。
AI.method: 采用Cornell型势能结合双阱薛定谔方法，研究质子和氘核在氢键中的隧穿，获得半解析波函数和隧穿分裂。
AI.result: 模型清晰地捕捉了同位素依赖的量子效应，展示了隧穿分裂随同位素质量的标度行为，分析了势垒宽度和曲率的影响，并与实验和计算结果进行了比较。
AI.conclusion: 该框架不仅适用于氢键研究，还为光谱学、酶催化和材料应用中双阱系统的隧穿建模提供了通用方法学。

title: Benchmarking Proton Tunneling Splittings with a Wavefunction-Based Double-Well Model: Application to the Formic Acid Dimer
comment: Submitted to International journal of Quantum chemistry
summary:
Proton tunneling across hydrogen bonds is a fundamental quantum effect with
implications for spectroscopy, catalysis, and biomolecular stability. While
state-of-the-art instanton and path-integral methods provide accurate
multidimensional tunneling splittings, simplified one-dimensional models remain
valuable as conceptual and benchmarking tools. Here we develop a
wavefunction-based framework for tunneling splittings using a Cornell-type
double-well potential and apply it as a benchmark for hydrogen-bond tunneling.
Analytical WKB estimates and numerical finite-difference solutions are compared
across a range of barrier parameters, showing consistent agreement. As a test
case, we map the formic acid dimer (FAD) barrier onto a quartic double-well
model parameterized to reproduce the reported barrier height of $V_b \\approx
2848~\\text{cm}^{-1}$. The resulting tunneling splitting of about
$0.037~\\text{cm}^{-1}$ matches the reduced-dimensional calculations of Qu and
Bowman. The close agreement between numerical and semiclassical results
highlights the pedagogical and diagnostic value of one-dimensional models,
while comparison with molecular benchmarks clarifies their limitations relative
to full multidimensional quantum treatments.

AI.tldr: 开发了一个基于波函数的框架，使用Cornell型双阱势来研究氢键隧穿分裂，并将其作为氢键隧穿的基准测试。
AI.motivation: 质子隧穿跨越氢键是一个基本的量子效应，对光谱学、催化和生物分子稳定性具有重要意义。虽然最先进的瞬子和路径积分方法能提供精确的多维隧穿分裂，但简化的一维模型作为概念和基准测试工具仍然很有价值。
AI.method: 使用Cornell型双阱势开发了基于波函数的隧穿分裂框架，比较了分析WKB估计和数值有限差分解在不同势垒参数下的结果。以甲酸二聚体为测试案例，将其势垒映射到四次双阱模型上。
AI.result: 对于甲酸二聚体，计算得到的隧穿分裂约为0.037 cm⁻¹，与Qu和Bowman的降维计算结果一致。数值和半经典结果之间的密切一致性突显了一维模型的教学和诊断价值。
AI.conclusion: 一维模型具有教学和诊断价值，但与分子基准的比较也明确了它们相对于完整多维量子处理的局限性。

title: Forbidden Electron Transfer in the Adiabatic Limit of the Marcus-Inverted Region
summary:
Here it is shown that in the adiabatic limit of condensed-phase electron
transfer, the onset of barrierless transition occurs at a lower driving force
than predicted by the non-adiabatic Marcus formulation. Furthermore, in the
adiabatic limit of the Marcus-inverted region, isoenergetic electron transfer
is strictly forbidden in the absence of nuclear tunneling. This "forbidden"
behavior arises from a topological change in the mapping between the adiabatic
and diabatic electronic surfaces, emerging precisely at the onset of the
Marcus-inverted region.

AI.tldr: 在凝聚相电子转移的绝热极限下，无势垒跃迁的起始点比非绝热Marcus理论预测的驱动力更低。在Marcus反转区的绝热极限中，等能电子转移在没有核隧穿的情况下被严格禁止，这是由于绝热和diabatic电子表面之间映射的拓扑变化导致的。
AI.motivation: 研究凝聚相电子转移在绝热极限下的行为，特别是与经典Marcus理论预测的差异，以及Marcus反转区中出现的特殊禁止现象。
AI.method: 通过分析绝热极限下电子转移的动力学，研究绝热和diabatic电子表面之间的映射关系，特别关注拓扑变化的发生条件。
AI.result: 发现无势垒跃迁的起始驱动力低于非绝热Marcus理论预测值；在Marcus反转区的绝热极限中，等能电子转移在没有核隧穿时被严格禁止。
AI.conclusion: 绝热极限下的电子转移行为与经典Marcus理论存在显著差异，特别是在反转区出现的拓扑变化导致了等能电子转移的禁止现象，这为理解凝聚相电子转移动力学提供了新的视角。

title: Collective excitations and divergent spin currents in non-centrosymmetric superconductors
summary:
We study the collective modes in a non-centrosymmetric superconductor with
Rashba spin-orbit coupling under laser irradiation. The concept of Anderson
Pseudospin Resonance allows to reveal how laser driving gives rise not only to
the established resonant enhancement of the third harmonic response, but also
to a resonant enhancement in the second harmonic response of the spin current.
We propose a theory which explains the phenomenon without including interband
transitions. The theory is corroborated by numerical simulations which
incorporate interband effects and allow us to clarify the signatures of the
collective modes in the long-time dynamics of the superconductor.

AI.tldr: 研究非中心对称超导体在激光照射下的集体模式，发现激光驱动不仅增强三次谐波响应，还增强自旋电流的二次谐波响应，提出了不包含带间跃迁的理论解释。
AI.motivation: 探索非中心对称超导体在激光驱动下的集体模式行为，特别是自旋电流谐波响应的增强现象。
AI.method: 使用Anderson伪自旋共振概念，提出不含带间跃迁的理论模型，并通过包含带间效应的数值模拟进行验证。
AI.result: 理论预测和数值模拟均显示激光驱动能增强自旋电流的二次谐波响应和三次谐波响应，揭示了集体模式在长时动力学中的特征。
AI.conclusion: 成功解释了非中心对称超导体中激光诱导的谐波响应增强现象，为理解集体模式在激光驱动系统中的行为提供了新视角。

title: Marginal Fermi liquids from Fermi surfaces coupled via matrix boson gas
summary:
We propose a model of metallic critical point which we study at $T=0$ in the
large-$N$ limit. We start with two species of fermions $c_i, f_i$, each with
$N$ flavors and matrix bosons $b_{ij}$ with $N^2$ components. They interact
with each other via slave-boson like interaction $\int b_{ij}^{\dagger} \,
c_i^{\dagger}f_j$. The bosons have a bare dispersion of
$\varepsilon_{\textbf{q}}^b = \lambda_z |\textbf{q}|^z$ and we study the
problem in $d$ spatial dimensions. We show that for $d = z+1,$ the electronic
self energy shows marginal Fermi liquid behavior. We first evaluate the
fermionic self energy $\Sigma(i\omega)$ using the standard approximate boson
self energy $\Pi(\textbf{q}, i\nu) \propto |\nu|/|\textbf{q}|$ and find that
$\Sigma(i\omega) \sim \omega \ln(N/|\omega|)$ which shows a much weaker
dependence on $N$ when compared with similar results from non-SYK large-$N$
Ising-nematic models. Then we evaluate $\Sigma(i\omega)$ again using a more
precise form of $\Pi$ which allows us to study the interplay between $N
\rightarrow \infty$ limit for which $\Sigma(i\omega) \sim \omega
\ln(1/|\omega|)$, and the $\omega \rightarrow 0$ limit where we recover
$\Sigma(i\omega) \sim \omega \ln(N/|\omega|)$. We also use the full bosonic
self energy to obtain the correction to the bosonic specific heat as
$\frac{T}{N} \ln(1/T)$. Since there are $N^2$ bosons and $N$ fermions, the bulk
heat capacity for both fermions and bosons show nearly similar functional form
$NVT \ln(N/T)$ and $NVT \ln(1/T)$ respectively for $T \rightarrow 0$.

AI.tldr: 提出了一个金属临界点模型，在T=0和大N极限下研究。模型包含两种费米子和矩阵玻色子，通过类slave-boson相互作用耦合。在d=z+1维时，电子自能呈现边际费米液体行为。
AI.motivation: 研究金属临界点附近的非费米液体行为，特别是在大N极限下电子自能和热容的标度行为。
AI.method: 使用大N展开方法，考虑两种费米子和矩阵玻色子的相互作用。通过计算费米子自能和玻色子自能，分析不同极限下的行为。
AI.result: 电子自能显示Σ(iω)∼ωln(N/|ω|)行为，热容修正为T/N ln(1/T)。费米子和玻色子的体热容分别表现为NVT ln(N/T)和NVT ln(1/T)。
AI.conclusion: 该模型成功描述了金属临界点处的边际费米液体行为，揭示了大N极限和低频极限之间的相互作用。

title: Making PLUMED fly: a tutorial on optimizing performance
summary:
PLUMED is an open-source software package that is widely used for analyzing
and enhancing molecular dynamics simulations that works in conjunction with
most available molecular dynamics softwares. While the computational cost of
PLUMED calculations is typically negligible compared to the molecular dynamics
code's force evaluation, the software is increasingly being employed for more
computationally demanding tasks where performance optimization becomes
critical. In this tutorial, we describe a recently implemented tool that can be
used to reliably measure code performance. We then use this tool to generate
detailed performance benchmarks that show how calculations of large-numbers of
distances, angles or torsions can be optimized by using vector-based commands
rather than individual scalar operations. We then present benchmarks that
illustrate how to optimize calculations of atomic order parameters and
secondary structure variables. Throughout the tutorial and in our
implementations we endeavor to explain the algorithmic tricks that are being
used to optimize the calculations so others can make use of these prescriptions
both when they are using PLUMED and when they are writing their own codes.

AI.tldr: PLUMED是一个广泛使用的开源软件包，用于分析和增强分子动力学模拟。本教程介绍了性能测量工具，展示了如何通过向量化命令优化距离、角度和扭转等计算，以及原子序参数和二级结构变量的计算优化。
AI.motivation: 随着PLUMED被用于计算要求更高的任务，性能优化变得至关重要。需要可靠的方法来测量代码性能，并优化计算密集型操作。
AI.method: 实现了一个性能测量工具，通过向量化命令替代标量操作来优化大量距离、角度和扭转的计算，同时优化原子序参数和二级结构变量的计算。
AI.result: 生成了详细的性能基准测试，展示了向量化操作相比标量操作的性能优势，为计算密集型任务提供了有效的优化方案。
AI.conclusion: 通过使用向量化命令和算法技巧，可以显著优化PLUMED中的计算性能，这些优化方法不仅适用于PLUMED，也可用于其他代码开发。

title: Dynamical Phase Transitions Across Slow and Fast Regimes in a Two-Tone Driven Duffing Resonator
summary:
The response of nonlinear resonators to multifrequency driving reveals rich
dynamics beyond conventional single-tone theory. We study a Duffing resonator
under bichromatic excitation and identify a competition between the two drives,
governed by their detuning and relative amplitudes. In the slow-beating regime,
where the tones are closely spaced, the secondary drive acts as a modulation
that induces dynamical phase transitions between coexisting stationary states.
We introduce the cycle-averaged amplitude as an order parameter and map the
resulting phase diagram as a function of the drive detuning and amplitude
ratio, capturing the pronounced asymmetry observed for blue versus red detuning
in experiment. We devise a model to link the onset of these transitions to the
resonance properties around the nonlinear stationary mode of the system. Our
results provide a framework for controlling driven nonlinear systems, enabling
state manipulation, and sensing in nanomechanical, optical, and superconducting
circuit platforms.

AI.tldr: 研究双色激励下的杜芬谐振器，发现两个驱动之间的竞争关系，在慢拍频区域次级驱动会诱导动态相变，建立了相图框架用于控制非线性系统。
AI.motivation: 多频驱动下非线性谐振器的响应展现出比单频理论更丰富的动力学行为，需要理解双驱动竞争机制及其对系统状态的影响。
AI.method: 使用杜芬谐振器模型，引入周期平均振幅作为序参量，构建相图分析驱动失谐和振幅比对系统行为的影响，建立模型连接相变起始与非线性稳态模式周围的共振特性。
AI.result: 发现了蓝移与红移失谐的明显不对称性，次级驱动在慢拍频区域会诱导动态相变，能够在共存稳态之间切换。
AI.conclusion: 为控制驱动非线性系统提供了框架，可在纳米机械、光学和超导电路平台中实现状态操纵和传感应用。

title: Nuclear spin-free 70Ge/28Si70Ge quantum well heterostructures grown on industrial SiGe-buffered wafers
comment: A supplementary material file is available for this article
summary:
The coherence of hole spin qubits in germanium planar heterostructures is
limited by the hyperfine coupling to the nuclear spin bath due to 29Si and 73Ge
isotopes. Thus, removing these nuclear spin-full isotopes is essential to
extend the hyperfine-limited coherence times needed to implement robust quantum
processors. This work demonstrates the epitaxial growth of device-grade nuclear
spin-free 70Ge/28Si70Ge heterostructures on industrial SiGe buffers while
minimizing the amounts of highly purified 70GeH4 and 28SiH4 used. The obtained
70Ge/28Si70Ge heterostructures exhibit a dislocation density of 5.3 x 10e6 cm-2
and an isotopic purity exceeding 99.99%, with carbon and oxygen impurities
below the detection sensitivity, as revealed by atom probe tomography.
Magnetotransport measurements on gated Hall bars demonstrate effective gate
control of hole density in nuclear spin-free quantum wells. Negative threshold
gate voltages confirm the absence of intentional doping in the wells, while
Hall and Shubnikov-de Haas analyses yield consistent carrier densities (1.4 x
10e11 cm-2) and high mobilities (2.4 x 10e5 cm2/Vs). Mobility trends reveal
interfacetrap- limited scattering and percolation concentration below 7 x 10e10
cm-2. These analyses, along with atomic-level studies, confirm the high quality
of epitaxial 70Ge/28Si70Ge heterostructures and their relevance as a platform
for long-coherence spin qubits.

AI.tldr: 该研究展示了在工业SiGe缓冲层上外延生长无核自旋同位素的70Ge/28Si70Ge异质结构，用于延长空穴自旋量子比特的相干时间。
AI.motivation: 锗平面异质结构中空穴自旋量子比特的相干性受限于与29Si和73Ge核自旋的超精细耦合，因此需要去除这些核自旋同位素以实现稳健的量子处理器。
AI.method: 采用最小化高纯度70GeH4和28SiH4用量的方法，在工业SiGe缓冲层上外延生长70Ge/28Si70Ge异质结构，并通过原子探针层析、磁输运测量等方法表征材料质量。
AI.result: 获得的异质结构位错密度为5.3×10^6 cm^-2，同位素纯度超过99.99%，碳氧杂质低于检测限。霍尔测量显示载流子密度1.4×10^11 cm^-2，迁移率达2.4×10^5 cm^2/Vs。
AI.conclusion: 该研究证实了70Ge/28Si70Ge异质结构的高质量及其作为长相干自旋量子比特平台的适用性。

title: Some remarks on the objectivity and thermodynamic consistency of Korteweg-type fluids
summary:
In this note we compare the entropy principle and the objectivity arguments
in the methodologies of Dunn and Serrin [1] and in the more recent weakly
nonlocal thermodynamic analysis of Korteweg-type fluids in [2]. It is concluded
that the different objectivity approaches lead to the same constitutive
functions, and that the difference in the thermodynamically compatible pressure
tensors of perfect Korteweg fluids is due to different symmetry requirements.

AI.tldr: 比较了Dunn和Serrin的熵原理与客观性论证方法，以及最近关于Korteweg型流体的弱非局部热力学分析，发现不同的客观性方法导致相同的本构函数，完美Korteweg流体的热力学相容压力张量差异源于不同的对称性要求。
AI.motivation: 比较不同热力学方法论中的熵原理和客观性论证，特别是Dunn和Serrin的方法与近期Korteweg型流体弱非局部热力学分析的差异。
AI.method: 对比分析Dunn和Serrin的熵原理与客观性论证方法，以及Korteweg型流体的弱非局部热力学分析方法。
AI.result: 不同的客观性方法导致相同的本构函数，完美Korteweg流体的热力学相容压力张量差异源于不同的对称性要求。
AI.conclusion: 不同的客观性方法在热力学分析中产生相同的本构函数，压力张量的差异主要来自对称性要求的不同。

title: Delta-learned force fields for nonbonded interactions: Addressing the strength mismatch between covalent-nonbonded interaction for global models
summary:
Noncovalent interactions--vdW dispersion, hydrogen/halogen bonding,
ion-$\pi$, and $\pi$-stacking--govern structure, dynamics, and emergent
phenomena in materials and molecular systems, yet accurately learning them
alongside covalent forces remains a core challenge for machine-learned force
fields (MLFFs). This challenge is acute for global models that use
Coulomb-matrix (CM) descriptors compared under Euclidean/Frobenius metrics in
multifragment settings. We show that the mismatch between predominantly
covalent force labels and the CM's overrepresentation of intermolecular
features biases single-model training and degrades force-field fidelity. To
address this, we introduce \textit{$\Delta$-sGDML}, a scale-aware formulation
within the sGDML framework that explicitly decouples intra- and intermolecular
physics by training fragment-specific models alongside a dedicated binding
model, then composing them at inference. Across benzene dimers, host-guest
complexes (C$_{60}$@buckycatcher, NO$_3^-$@i-corona[6]arene), benzene-water,
and benzene-Na$^+$, \mbox{$\Delta$-sGDML} delivers consistent gains over a
single global model, with fragment-resolved force-error reductions up to
\textbf{75\%}, without loss of energy accuracy. Furthermore, molecular-dynamics
simulations further confirm that the $\Delta$-model yields a reliable force
field for C$_{60}$@buckycatcher, producing stable trajectories across a wide
range of temperatures (10-400~K), unlike the single global model, which loses
stability above $\sim$200~K. The method offers a practical route to homogenize
per-fragment errors and recover reliable noncovalent physics in global MLFFs.

AI.tldr: Δ-sGDML方法通过分离训练分子内和分子间模型，解决了传统机器学习力场在处理非共价相互作用时的偏差问题，显著提高了力预测精度。
AI.motivation: 非共价相互作用在材料和分子系统中至关重要，但传统机器学习力场在处理这些相互作用时存在偏差，特别是当使用Coulomb矩阵描述符时，分子间特征的过度表示会降低力场保真度。
AI.method: 在sGDML框架内引入Δ-sGDML方法，通过分别训练片段特异性模型和专门的结合模型，在推理时将它们组合起来，明确解耦分子内和分子间物理。
AI.result: 在多个测试系统中，Δ-sGDML相比单一全局模型实现了高达75%的力误差减少，且不损失能量精度。分子动力学模拟显示Δ模型在宽温度范围内(10-400K)保持稳定，而全局模型在约200K以上失去稳定性。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为在全局机器学习力场中均匀化片段误差和恢复可靠的非共价物理提供了一条实用途径。

title: Origin of sublattice particle-hole asymmetry in monolayer FeSe superconductors
summary:
In iron-based superconductors, the two Fe atoms in the unit cell are
typically related by crystal symmetries; therefore, we expect no intra-unit
cell variations in the superconducting gap. However, recent experiments have
challenged this expectation, reporting intra-unit cell variations in the gap
with an unusual particle-hole asymmetry. Here, we examine the origin of this
asymmetry between the two Fe sublattices in monolayer FeSe grown on SrTiO$_3$.
We reveal that, in addition to the substrate-induced broken inversion symmetry,
substrate nematic symmetry breaking is key to observing this asymmetry. We
further identify two possible mechanisms through which this can occur. The
first is through an odd-parity gap function that coexists with an extended
$s$-wave function. The second is via a nodeless $d$-wave gap function that
develops in the presence of a symmetry-breaking substrate. We argue that the
latter mechanism is more physical. To test our theory, we performed scanning
tunneling spectroscopy measurements across the nematic domain walls, which
exhibit a clear enhancement of the asymmetry between the two Fe sublattices. In
addition, we reveal that the observed sublattice particle-hole asymmetry is
associated with odd-frequency pairing correlations, providing an experimental
realization of this unusual pairing correlation.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了FeSe/SrTiO3超导体中两个Fe亚晶格间的粒子-空穴不对称性，揭示了衬底诱导的向列对称性破缺是关键机制，提出了两种可能的配对函数机制，并通过实验验证了奇频配对关联的存在。
AI.motivation: 传统理论认为铁基超导体中两个Fe原子因晶体对称性应具有相同的超导能隙，但实验观测到反常的粒子-空穴不对称性，需要解释这一现象的物理起源。
AI.method: 通过理论分析提出两种机制（奇宇称配对函数与扩展s波共存，或向列对称性破缺下的无节点d波），并通过扫描隧道谱测量跨越向列畴壁的实验验证。
AI.result: 实验观测到向列畴壁处两个Fe亚晶格间不对称性增强，证实了衬底向列对称性破缺的作用，并发现这种不对称性与奇频配对关联相关。
AI.conclusion: 衬底诱导的向列对称性破缺是产生FeSe/SrTiO3中粒子-空穴不对称性的关键机制，无节点d波机制更合理，且该现象实现了奇频配对关联的实验观测。

title: Role of on-site Coulomb energy and negative-charge transfer in a Dirac semi-metal
comment: 10 pages, 10 figures (submitted to Physical Review B)
summary:
Angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy in combination with band structure
calculations have shown that the layered transition metal dichalcogenide
NiTe$_2$ is a type-II Dirac semimetal. However, there are conflicting
conclusions in the literature regarding the role of electron correlations in
NiTe$_2$. We study the core-level and valence band electronic structure of
single crystal NiTe$_2$ using soft and hard X-ray photoemission spectroscopy
(SXPES, HAXPES), X-ray absorption spectroscopy (XAS) and Ni $2p-3d$ resonant
photoemission spectroscopy(resonant-PES) to quantify electronic parameters in
NiTe$_2$. The on-site Coulomb energy ($U_{dd}$) in the Ni $3d$ states is
quantified from measurements of the Ni $3d$ single particle density of states
and the two-hole correlation satellite. The Ni $2p$ core level and $L$-edge XAS
spectra are analyzed by charge transfer cluster model calculations using the
experimentally estimated $U_{dd}$ (= 3.7 eV), and the results show that
NiTe$_2$ exhibits a negative charge-transfer energy ($\Delta$ = -2.8 eV). The
same type of cluster model analysis of NiO $L$-edge XAS confirms its well-known
strongly correlated charge-transfer insulator character, with $U_{dd}$ = 7.0 eV
and $\Delta$ = 6.0 eV. The $d$-$p$ hybridization strength $T_{eg}$ for
NiTe$_2$$<$NiO, and indicates that the reduced $U_{dd}$ in
NiTe\textsubscript{2} compared to NiO is not due to an increase in $T_{eg}$.
The increase in $d^n$ count on the Ni site in NiTe$_{2}$ by nearly one electron
is attributed to negative-$\Delta$ and a reduced $U_{dd}$. However, since
$U_{dd}$$>$$|\Delta|$, the results indicate the important role of a finite
repulsive $U_{dd}$ in making NiTe$_{2}$ a moderately correlated $p$-type Dirac
semi-metal.

AI.tldr: NiTe₂是一种II型狄拉克半金属，本文通过多种光谱技术量化了其电子参数，发现NiTe₂具有负电荷转移能和适度的电子关联性，使其成为中等关联的p型狄拉克半金属。
AI.motivation: 解决文献中关于NiTe₂中电子关联作用存在的争议，通过实验量化电子参数来明确其电子结构特性。
AI.method: 使用软X射线和硬X射线光电子能谱(SXPES, HAXPES)、X射线吸收光谱(XAS)和Ni 2p-3d共振光电子能谱(resonant-PES)，结合电荷转移团簇模型计算分析。
AI.result: 测得Ni 3d态在位库仑能U_{dd}=3.7 eV，负电荷转移能Δ=-2.8 eV，d-p杂化强度T_{eg}小于NiO，表明NiTe₂是中等关联的p型狄拉克半金属。
AI.conclusion: NiTe₂具有负电荷转移能和适度的电子关联性，有限的正U_{dd}在使其成为p型狄拉克半金属中起重要作用。

title: Current Cross-Correlation Spectroscopy of Majorana Bound States
summary:
The clock speed of topological quantum computers based on Majorana zero mode
(MZM)-supporting nanoscale devices is determined by the time taken for
electrons to traverse the device. We employ the time-dependent
Landauer-B{\"u}ttiker transport theory for current cross-lead correlations in a
superconducting nanowire junction hosting MZMs. From the time-dependent quantum
noise, we are able to extract traversal times for electrons crossing the
system. After demonstrating a linear scaling of traversal times with nanowire
length, we present a heuristic formula for the traversal times which accurately
captures their behaviour. We then connect our framework to a proposed
experimental verification of this discriminant between spurious and genuine
MZMs utilizing time-resolved transport measurements.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了基于马约拉纳零模的拓扑量子计算机的时钟速度，通过时间相关的量子噪声提取电子穿越系统的传输时间，并提出了一个启发式公式来描述传输时间与纳米线长度的线性关系。
AI.motivation: 研究马约拉纳零模纳米器件的时钟速度限制，因为这是拓扑量子计算机性能的关键因素，需要区分真实和虚假的马约拉纳零模。
AI.method: 采用时间相关的Landauer-Büttiker输运理论，分析超导纳米线结中马约拉纳零模的跨引线电流关联，从时间相关的量子噪声中提取电子传输时间。
AI.result: 发现电子传输时间与纳米线长度呈线性比例关系，提出了一个能准确描述传输时间行为的启发式公式。
AI.conclusion: 该框架可用于通过时间分辨输运测量来实验验证真实马约拉纳零模与虚假马约拉纳零模的区别，为拓扑量子计算机的时钟速度优化提供理论基础。

title: Posterior corrections for systematic distortions in atomic-resolution images from hexagonal crystals
comment: 6 pages, 6 figures, submitted as part of Lanano 2025
summary:
Digital images from crystals, as projected from the third spatial dimension
and recorded in atomic resolution with any kind of real-world microscope,
feature necessarily broken symmetries of the translation-periodicity-restricted
Euclidean plane. The symmetry breakings are due to both the imaging process and
the real structure of the imaged crystal, with the former cause typically
dominating. A posterior algorithmic reduction of the symmetry breaking in such
images constitutes, thus, often a correction for many of the distortions that
were introduced by the imaging processes. Numerically quantified restorations
of such symmetries can, therefore, be used to demonstrate the efficacy of a
newly implemented posterior correction method for atomic-resolution images from
hexagonal crystals. Recently developed information theory based methods are
here shown to be suitable for this purpose. Thirteen experimental
atomic-resolution images from graphite and monolayer molybdenite (MoS2), as
respectively obtained by scanning tunneling microscopy, atomic force microscopy
in the torsional resonance mode, and aberration-corrected parallel illumination
transmission electron microscopy served as test cases in our larger (in its
totality so far unpublished) study, from which we quote here. The source code
of the software that was used for our distortion corrections and the whole
report on that study are freely available on GitHub.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于信息论的后处理方法来校正原子分辨率图像中的对称性破坏，通过恢复六方晶体的平移周期性对称性来证明新方法的有效性。
AI.motivation: 由于成像过程和晶体真实结构导致的对称性破坏，需要开发后处理算法来校正这些失真，特别是针对六方晶体的原子分辨率图像。
AI.method: 使用基于信息论的方法，对来自石墨和单层二硫化钼的13张实验原子分辨率图像进行失真校正，这些图像分别通过扫描隧道显微镜、原子力显微镜和像差校正透射电子显微镜获得。
AI.result: 开发的方法能够有效校正图像中的对称性破坏，证明了新方法的有效性。相关源代码和研究报告已在GitHub上公开。
AI.conclusion: 基于信息论的后处理方法能够成功校正原子分辨率图像中的对称性破坏，为晶体图像分析提供了有效的校正工具。

title: Mittag-Leffler Quantum Statistics and Thermodynamic Anomalies
summary:
Building upon the framework established in our recent work [M. Seifi et al.,
Phys. Rev. E 111, 054114 (2025)], wherein a generalized Maxwell Boltzmann
distribution was formulated using the Mittag Leffler function within the
superstatistical formalism, we extend this approach to the quantum domain.
Specifically, we introduce two statistical distributions,termed the Mittag
Leffler Bose Einstein (MLBE) and Mittag Leffler Fermi Dirac (MLFD)
distributions, constructed by generalizing the conventional Bose-Einstein and
Fermi-Dirac distributions through the Mittag-Leffler function. This
generalization incorporates a deformation parameter (\alpha), which facilitates
a continuous interpolation between bosonic and fermionic statistics, while
inherently capturing nonequilibrium effects and generalized thermodynamic
behavior. We analyze the thermodynamic geometry associated with these
distributions and identify significant departures from standard statistical
models. Notably, the MLBE distribution manifests a Bose-Einstein-like
condensation even in the absence of interactions, whereas the MLFD distribution
exhibits unconventional features, such as negative heat capacity in the
low-temperature regime. These findings highlight the pivotal role of
statistical deformation in determining emergent macroscopic thermodynamic
phenomena.

AI.tldr: 基于先前建立的超统计框架，将Mittag-Leffler函数推广到量子领域，提出了MLBE和MLFD两种统计分布，通过变形参数α实现玻色-费米统计的连续插值，并展现了非平衡效应和非常规热力学行为。
AI.motivation: 将先前工作中基于Mittag-Leffler函数的广义麦克斯韦-玻尔兹曼分布扩展到量子领域，探索统计变形对宏观热力学现象的影响。
AI.method: 通过Mittag-Leffler函数推广传统的玻色-爱因斯坦和费米-狄拉克分布，引入变形参数α构建MLBE和MLFD分布，并分析相关的热力学几何。
AI.result: MLBE分布即使在无相互作用情况下也表现出玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚，而MLFD分布在低温区域显示出负热容等非常规特征，热力学几何与标准统计模型有显著差异。
AI.conclusion: 统计变形在决定涌现的宏观热力学现象中起着关键作用，这些广义分布能够捕捉非平衡效应和广义热力学行为。

title: Edge Irregularity Strength: A Complementary Descriptor to Topological Indices in QSPR and QSAR Studies
summary:
In chemical graph theory, topological indices are widely used as numerical
descriptors for establishing quantitative structure-property relationships
(QSPR) and quantitative structure-activity relationships (QSAR). These indices
successfully correlate molecular structure with various physicochemical and
biological properties. In addition to these methods, the concept of edge
irregularity strength, a graph labeling measure, offers another perspective for
representing structural characteristics. In this context, the edge irregularity
strength concept provides a systematic way of assigning numerical labels to
atoms based on specific rules. In this work, we explore the chemical
applicability of the edge irregularity strength and demonstrate that it can
also serve as a predictive tool for physicochemical properties, similar to
topological indices. The findings show that the edge irregularity strength
captures molecular features and complements existing approaches to
structure-property analysis in chemical graph theory.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了边不规则强度在化学图论中的应用，证明其可作为预测物理化学性质的工具，类似于拓扑指数。
AI.motivation: 在化学图论中，拓扑指数被广泛用于建立定量结构-性质关系(QSPR)和定量结构-活性关系(QSAR)。除了这些方法，边不规则强度概念提供了另一种表示结构特征的角度。
AI.method: 探索边不规则强度在化学中的适用性，这是一种基于特定规则为原子分配数值标签的图标记方法。
AI.result: 研究发现边不规则强度能够捕捉分子特征，并补充了化学图论中现有的结构-性质分析方法。
AI.conclusion: 边不规则强度可以作为预测物理化学性质的有效工具，与拓扑指数类似，为结构-性质分析提供了新的视角。

title: Electronic state of superconductivity in line nodal material CaSb2 under pressure up to 4.2 GPa
summary:
We report the results of resistance measurements under pressure up to
$4.2\,\mathrm{GPa}$ on single-crystalline $\mathrm{CaSb}_2$ , which shows the
maximum of superconducting transition temperature $T_\mathrm{c}$ at
$3.1\,\mathrm{GPa}$. At room temperature, $R(P)$ shows a subtle anomaly at
$3.1\,\mathrm{GPa}$. However, Bloch-Gr\"uneisen analysis of $R(T)$ indicates
that the electronic state does not change significantly across
$3.1\,\mathrm{GPa}$.

AI.tldr: 在CaSb₂单晶中，压力达到3.1 GPa时超导转变温度Tc达到最大值，但电子态没有显著变化
AI.motivation: 研究压力对CaSb₂超导性质的影响，特别是Tc最大值对应的压力点
AI.method: 在高达4.2 GPa压力下对CaSb₂单晶进行电阻测量，使用Bloch-Grüneisen分析R(T)曲线
AI.result: 在3.1 GPa压力下观察到Tc最大值，室温电阻R(P)在3.1 GPa处有轻微异常，但电子态没有显著变化
AI.conclusion: 虽然Tc在3.1 GPa达到峰值，但该压力点并不对应电子态的根本性变化

title: Benchmarking Non-perturbative Many-Body Approaches in the Exactly Solvable Hatsugai-Kohmoto Model
summary:
The accurate simulation of strongly correlated electron systems remains a
central challenge in condensed matter physics, motivating the development of
various non-perturbative many-body methods. Such methods are typically
benchmarked against the numerical exact determinant quantum Monte Carlo (DQMC)
in the Hubbard model; however, DQMC is limited by the fermionic sign problem
and the uncertainties of numerical analytic continuation. To address these
issues, we use the exactly solvable Hatsugai-Kohmoto (HK) model as a
benchmarking platform to evaluate three many-body approximations: $GW$, $HGW$,
and $SGW$. We compare the Green's functions, spectral functions, and response
functions obtained from these approximations with the exact solutions. Our
analysis shows that the $GW$ approximation, often considered insufficient for
describing strong correlation, exhibits a previously unreported solution branch
that accurately reproduces Mott physics in the HK model. In addition, using a
covariant formalism, we find that $HGW$ provides an accurate description of
charge response, while $SGW$ performs well for spin correlations. Overall, our
work demonstrates that the HK model can effectively benchmark many-body
approximations and helps refine the understanding of $GW$ methods in strongly
correlated regimes.

AI.tldr: 使用可精确求解的Hatsugai-Kohmoto模型作为基准平台，评估GW、HGW和SGW三种多体近似方法，发现GW方法存在未报道的解分支能准确描述Mott物理，HGW对电荷响应描述准确，SGW对自旋关联表现良好。
AI.motivation: 强关联电子系统的精确模拟是凝聚态物理的核心挑战，现有方法通常以DQMC为基准，但DQMC受费米子符号问题和数值解析延拓不确定性限制。
AI.method: 使用可精确求解的HK模型作为基准，比较GW、HGW和SGW近似与精确解在格林函数、谱函数和响应函数方面的差异。
AI.result: 发现GW近似存在未报道的解分支能准确再现Mott物理；HGW能准确描述电荷响应；SGW对自旋关联表现良好。
AI.conclusion: HK模型能有效基准多体近似方法，有助于完善对GW方法在强关联区域的理解。

title: Ultrafast magnetic moment transfer and bandgap renormalization in monolayer \ce{FeCl2}
summary:
The microscopic origin of laser-induced ultrafast demagnetization remains an
open question, to which the non-thermal electronic distribution plays a vital
role at the initial stage. Herein, we investigate the connection between the
non-thermal electronic distribution and the ultrafast spin dynamics as well as
the electronic structure evolution in ferromagnetic \ce{FeCl2} monolayer using
real-time time-dependent density functional theory (rt-TDDFT) with
self-consistent Hubbard $U$ correction. Our simulations reveal that femtosecond
laser pulses induce ultrafast magnetic moment transfer from Fe to Cl atoms.
More importantly, through a comprehensive analysis of orbital-resolved
electronic structure, we elucidate the microscopic origin of this transfer,
attributing it to specific intra-atomic and inter-atomic charge transfer
pathways driven by non-thermal excitations. The extent of demagnetization of Fe
atoms exhibits a non-monotonic dependence on the laser photon energy, reaching
a maximum at the resonant excitation. In addition, the dynamical evolution of
the band structure was studied based on the eigenstates of the instantaneous
Hamiltonian. Under resonant excitation, the bandgap reduction reaches up to
$41\%$ within tens of fs. These findings provide fundamental insights into
ultrafast spin control and suggest a strategy to optically engineer the
magnetism in two-dimensional magnetic materials.

AI.tldr: 利用实时含时密度泛函理论研究FeCl2单层中飞秒激光诱导的超快退磁过程，揭示了Fe到Cl原子的磁矩转移机制及其非单调的激光能量依赖性。
AI.motivation: 探索激光诱导超快退磁的微观起源，特别是非热电子分布在初始阶段的关键作用。
AI.method: 采用实时含时密度泛函理论（rt-TDDFT）结合自洽Hubbard U修正，研究FeCl2单层的超快自旋动力学和电子结构演化。
AI.result: 发现飞秒激光脉冲诱导Fe到Cl原子的超快磁矩转移，退磁程度与激光光子能量呈非单调依赖关系，在共振激发时达到最大；共振激发下带隙在数十飞秒内减少达41%。
AI.conclusion: 阐明了非热激发驱动的特定原子内和原子间电荷转移路径是磁矩转移的微观机制，为二维磁性材料的光学磁控提供了新策略。

title: Fabrication and characterization of high-Q silicon nitride membrane resonators
summary:
Silicon nitride membranes are a powerful and ubiquitous optomechanical
resonator technology, enabling high mechanical Q, low optical loss, and
enhanced optomechanical coupling via a panoply of strain-, phononic-, and
photonic-crystal engineering techniques. Fabrication and characterization of
silicon nitride membranes has become a form of tacit knowledge in optomechanics
research groups. Here we present a video run-through of the design,
fabrication, and characterization of a contemporary silicon nitride membrane
resonator (specifically, a centimeter-scale Si3N4 nanoribbon supporting
$Q>10^8$ torsion modes). Our tutorial can serve as a starting point or
refresher for practitioners in the field.

AI.tldr: 本论文提供了一个关于硅氮化物薄膜谐振器的设计、制造和表征的视频教程，特别关注厘米级Si3N4纳米带支撑的高Q值扭转模式。
AI.motivation: 硅氮化物薄膜是强大且普遍的光机械谐振器技术，但其制造和表征已成为光力学研究小组中的隐性知识，需要系统化的教程来指导实践者。
AI.method: 通过视频运行展示当代硅氮化物薄膜谐振器的设计、制造和表征过程，特别演示了厘米级Si3N4纳米带的制备技术。
AI.result: 成功制备出支撑Q>10^8扭转模式的硅氮化物纳米带谐振器，验证了该制造方法的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 该教程可作为该领域实践者的入门指南或复习材料，有助于推广硅氮化物薄膜谐振器技术的标准化制造流程。

title: Equivalence of charged and neutral density functional formulations for correcting the many-body self-interaction of polarons
summary:
The electron self-interaction problem in density functional theory affects
the accurate modeling of polarons, particularly their localization and
formation energy. Charged and neutral density functional formulations have been
developed to address this issue, yet their relationship remains unclear. Here,
we demonstrate their equivalence in treating the many-body self-interaction of
the polaron state. In particular, we connect with each other piecewise-linear
functionals based on adding an extra charge to the supercell, the pSIC approach
derived from the energetics of the neutral defect with polaronic distortions in
a supercell, and the unit-cell method for polarons based on electron-phonon
couplings. We show that these approaches lead to the same formal expression of
the self-interaction corrected energy, which is fully defined by the energetics
of the neutral charge state of the charged polaronic structure. Residual
differences between these methods solely arise from the achieved polaronic
structure, which is affected by different treatments of electron-screening and
finite-size effects. We apply these methods to a set of prototypical small hole
and electron polarons, including the hole polaron in MgO, the hole polaron in
$\beta$-Ga$_2$O$_3$, the $V_\text{k}$ center in NaI, the electron polaron in
BiVO$_4$, and the electron polaron in TiO$_2$. We show that the ground-state
properties of polarons obtained using charged and neutral density functional
formulations are in excellent agreement.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了处理极化子自相互作用的带电和中性密度泛函方法的等价性，揭示了它们都产生相同的自相互作用修正能量表达式，差异仅源于对电子屏蔽和有限尺寸效应的不同处理。
AI.motivation: 密度泛函理论中的电子自相互作用问题影响了极化子的准确建模，特别是其局域化和形成能。虽然已开发了带电和中性密度泛函公式来解决此问题，但它们之间的关系仍不清楚。
AI.method: 通过连接基于向超胞添加额外电荷的分段线性泛函、从中性缺陷能量学推导的pSIC方法，以及基于电子-声子耦合的极化子单胞方法，证明这些方法在形式上的等价性。
AI.result: 这些方法都导致相同的自相互作用修正能量形式表达式，仅因对电子屏蔽和有限尺寸效应的不同处理而产生残余差异。在多个典型小空穴和电子极化子系统中，带电和中性密度泛函方法得到的极化子基态性质高度一致。
AI.conclusion: 带电和中性密度泛函方法在极化子自相互作用处理上是等价的，它们都通过中性电荷态的能量学来完全定义自相互作用修正能量，为准确建模极化子提供了理论基础。

title: Nonequilibrium Macroscopic Response Relations for Counting Statistics
summary:
Understanding how macroscopic nonequilibrium systems respond to changes in
external or internal parameters remains a fundamental challenge in physics. In
this work, we report a parameter transitional symmetry valid for macroscopic
dynamics arbitrarily far from equilibrium. The symmetry leads to exact response
relations and gives meaningful expansions in both linear and short-time
regimes. This framework provides a universal description of macroscopic
response phenomena arbitrarily far from equilibrium - including non-stationary
processes and time-dependent attractors. The theory is validated and
demonstrated numerically using the Willamowski-Rossler model, which exhibits
rich dynamical behaviors including limit cycles and chaos.

AI.tldr: 本文报告了一种适用于任意远离平衡态的宏观动力学的参数过渡对称性，该对称性导致精确的响应关系，并在线性和短时区域中给出有意义的展开。
AI.motivation: 理解宏观非平衡系统如何响应外部或内部参数的变化是物理学中的一个基本挑战。
AI.method: 提出参数过渡对称性框架，该对称性适用于任意远离平衡态的宏观动力学，并通过Willamowski-Rossler模型进行数值验证。
AI.result: 该对称性导致精确的响应关系，在线性和短时区域中给出有意义的展开，为任意远离平衡态的宏观响应现象提供普适描述。
AI.conclusion: 该理论提供了一个普适框架来描述任意远离平衡态的宏观响应现象，包括非稳态过程和时间依赖吸引子。

title: Size-Consistent Adiabatic Connection Functionals via Orbital-Based Matrix Interpolation
comment:
26 pages, 4 figures, 2 tables in the main text; 11 pages, 6 figures,
  3 tables in the Supporting Information
summary:
We introduce a size-consistent and orbital-invariant formalism for
constructing correlation functionals based on the adiabatic connection for
density functional theory (DFT). By constructing correlation energy matrices
for the weak and strong correlation limits in the space of occupied orbitals,
our method, which we call orbital-based size-consistent matrix interpolation
(OSMI), avoids previous difficulties in the construction of size-consistent
adiabatic connection functionals. We design a simple, nonempirical adiabatic
connection and a one-parameter strong-interaction limit functional, and we show
that the resulting method reproduces the correlation energy of the uniform
electron gas over a wide range of densities. When applied to subsets of the
GMTKN55 thermochemistry database, OSMI is more accurate on average than MP2 and
nonempirical density functionals. Most notably, OSMI provides excellent
predictions of the barrier heights we tested, with average errors of less than
2 kcal mol$^{-1}$. Finally, we find that OSMI improves the trade-off between
fractional spin and fractional charge errors for bond dissociation curves
compared to DFT and MP2. The fact that OSMI provides a good description of
molecular systems and the uniform electron gas, while also maintaining low
self-interaction error and size-consistency, suggests that it could provide a
framework for studying heterogeneous chemical systems.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于轨道的大小一致性矩阵插值方法(OSMI)，用于构建密度泛函理论中的相关泛函，该方法在弱相关和强相关极限下构建相关能矩阵，解决了传统方法中大小一致性的问题。

AI.method: 通过构建占据轨道空间中的相关能矩阵，设计简单的非经验绝热连接和一参数强相互作用极限泛函，实现轨道不变性和大小一致性。
AI.result: OSMI方法在GMTKN55热化学数据库子集上比MP2和非经验密度泛函更准确，特别是对能垒高度的预测误差小于2 kcal mol⁻¹，且在键解离曲线上改进了分数自旋和分数电荷误差的权衡。
AI.conclusion: OSMI方法为研究异质化学系统提供了一个良好框架，能够同时准确描述分子系统和均匀电子气，同时保持低自相互作用误差和大小一致性。

title: Spin and orbital excitations in undoped infinite layers: a comparison between superconducting PrNiO2 and insulating CaCuO2
summary:
Infinite-layer nickelates are among the most promising cuprate-akin
superconductors, although relevant differences from copper oxides have been
reported. Here, we present momentum- and polarization-resolved RIXS
measurements on chemically undoped, superconducting PrNiO2, and compare its
magnetic and orbital excitations with those of the reference infinite layer
cuprate CaCuO2. In PrNiO2, the in-plane magnetic exchange integrals are smaller
than in CaCuO2, whereas the out-of-plane values are similar, indicating that
both materials support a three-dimensional antiferromagnetic order. Orbital
excitations, associated to the transitions within 3d states of the metal, are
well reproduced within a single-ion model and display similar characteristics,
except for the Ni-dxy peak which, besides lying at significantly lower energy,
shows an opposite dispersion to that of Cu-dxy. This is interpreted as a
consequence of orbital superexchange coupling between nearest neighbor sites,
which drives the orbiton propagation. Our observations demonstrate that
infinitelayer cuprates and nickelates share most of the spin and orbital
properties, despite their markedly different charge-transfer energy Delta.

AI.tldr: 通过RIXS测量比较无限层镍酸盐PrNiO2和铜酸盐CaCuO2的磁性和轨道激发，发现两者在自旋和轨道性质上具有高度相似性，尽管电荷转移能存在显著差异。
AI.motivation: 研究无限层镍酸盐作为最有前景的类铜酸盐超导体，探索其与铜氧化物在磁性和轨道激发方面的异同。
AI.method: 使用动量和偏振分辨的共振非弹性X射线散射(RIXS)测量未掺杂超导PrNiO2，并与参考材料CaCuO2进行比较。
AI.result: PrNiO2的面内磁交换积分小于CaCuO2，而面外值相似；轨道激发在单离子模型中表现相似，但Ni-dxy峰能量更低且具有相反的色散，这归因于轨道超交换耦合。
AI.conclusion: 无限层铜酸盐和镍酸盐在自旋和轨道性质上具有高度相似性，尽管它们的电荷转移能存在显著差异。

title: The two-dimensional optical Su-Schrieffer-Heeger model: ground state and thermodynamic properties
summary:
We investigate the two-dimensional optical Su-Schrieffer-Heeger (SSH) model,
in which the electron hopping amplitude is modulated by the difference between
neighboring phonon coordinates. Using sign-problem-free auxiliary-field quantum
Monte Carlo simulations, complemented by mean-field analysis, we determine the
long-range ordered phases as a function of the electron-phonon coupling and
phonon frequency. By examining both adiabatic and antiadiabatic regimes, we
reveal the emergence of staggered and armchair valence bond solid (VBS) phases,
as well as the O(4) antiferromagnetic phase. In addition, finite-temperature
simulations show that the VBS transition occurs at critical temperatures
significantly higher than in models with local electron-phonon coupling,
consistent with the presence of lighter polarons in the metallic regime. These
findings establish the ground-state and finite-temperature phase diagrams of
the optical SSH model, which emphasize its similarities and contrasts with
other electron-phonon systems.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了二维光学SSH模型，通过量子蒙特卡洛模拟揭示了不同电子-声子耦合和声子频率下的长程有序相，包括交错和扶手椅价键固体相以及O(4)反铁磁相。
AI.motivation: 研究二维光学SSH模型中电子-声子耦合对长程有序相的影响，探索不同参数区域下的相变行为。
AI.method: 使用无符号问题的辅助场量子蒙特卡洛模拟，辅以平均场分析，考察绝热和反绝热区域。
AI.result: 发现了交错和扶手椅价键固体相以及O(4)反铁磁相，VBS相变临界温度显著高于局域电子-声子耦合模型。
AI.conclusion: 建立了光学SSH模型的基态和有限温度相图，揭示了与其他电子-声子系统的相似性和差异性。

title: From Densities to Potentials: Benchmarking Local Exchange-Correlation Approximations
comment:
25 Figures, 7 Tables, 31 Pages including supplemental material.
  Submitted to PRB
summary:
Using the Kohn-Sham (KS) inversion method of Hollins et al. [J. Phys.:
Condens. Matter 29, 04LT01 (2017)], we invert densities from variational and
diffusion quantum Monte Carlo (QMC) calculations to obtain benchmark QMC-KS
potentials for a range of insulators and semiconductors, which we then compare
to the KS potentials of popular density functional approximations (DFAs). Our
results show that different DFAs yield similar electron densities, despite
differences in their KS potentials, which originate primarily from the exchange
and correlation contribution. We also find that the KS gap from the QMC density
is typically larger than the KS gaps of most DFAs, with the exception of
Hartree-Fock. Finally, the KS gap is sensitive to the inclusion of semicore
states in the pseudopotentials, such that comparison with experiment should be
done with caution.

AI.tldr: 通过Kohn-Sham反演方法从量子蒙特卡洛计算获得基准KS势，与常用密度泛函近似进行比较，发现不同DFA产生相似电子密度但KS势不同，QMC-KS能隙通常大于大多数DFA。
AI.motivation: 为绝缘体和半导体提供基准的QMC-KS势，用于评估常用密度泛函近似的准确性。
AI.method: 使用Kohn-Sham反演方法，从变分和扩散量子蒙特卡洛计算得到的密度反演出QMC-KS势。
AI.result: 不同DFA产生相似电子密度但KS势不同；QMC-KS能隙通常大于大多数DFA（Hartree-Fock除外）；KS能隙对赝势中半芯态的包含很敏感。
AI.conclusion: QMC提供了可靠的KS势基准，DFA的KS势差异主要来自交换关联贡献，与实验比较时需谨慎考虑赝势中半芯态的影响。

title: Nanofluidic logic based on chiral skyrmion flows
comment:
23 pages, 5 figures. Please refer to published version:
  https://www.pnas.org/doi/10.1073/pnas.2506204122
summary:
Particle-like chiral magnetic skyrmions can flow in nanotracks and behave
like chiral fluids. Using interacting flows to perform logical operations is an
important topic in microfluidics and nanofluidics. Here, we report a basic
nanofluidic logic computing system based on chiral magnetic skyrmions flowing
in parallel pipelines connected by an H-shaped junction. The flow behaviors
could be manipulated by adjusting the spin polarization angle, which controls
the intrinsic skyrmion Hall angle. We demonstrate that within certain range of
the spin polarization angle, fully developed skyrmion flows could lead to
fluidic logical operations, which significantly reduce the complexity of
skyrmion logic as there is no need for deterministic creation, precise control,
and detection of a single isolated skyrmion. Our results suggest that the
chiral flow behaviors of magnetic quasiparticles may offer possibilities for
spintronic and nanofluidic functions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于手性磁斯格明子在H形连接平行管道中流动的纳米流体逻辑计算系统，通过调节自旋极化角控制斯格明子霍尔角，实现流体逻辑运算。
AI.motivation: 利用相互作用流执行逻辑操作是微流体和纳米流体领域的重要课题，手性磁斯格明子可以像手性流体一样在纳米轨道中流动。
AI.method: 使用手性磁斯格明子在平行管道中流动，通过H形连接器连接，通过调整自旋极化角来控制斯格明子霍尔角，从而操纵流动行为。
AI.result: 在特定自旋极化角范围内，完全发展的斯格明子流可以实现流体逻辑运算，显著降低了斯格明子逻辑的复杂性。
AI.conclusion: 磁性准粒子的手性流动行为可能为自旋电子学和纳米流体功能提供新的可能性。

title: Beyond Spin Coating: Homogeneous All-Inorganic Perovskite Films via High-Pressure Recrystallization
summary:
Metal halide perovskites are promising materials for optoelectronic
applications owing to their outstanding optical and electronic properties.
Among them, all-inorganic perovskites such as CsPbBr$_3$ offer superior thermal
and chemical stability. However, obtaining high-quality CsPbBr$_3$ thin films
via solution processing remains challenging due to the precursor's low
solubility, and current additive or solvent engineering strategies are often
complex and poorly reproducible. High-pressure recrystallization has recently
emerged as a promising route to improve film quality, yet its impact on film
properties remains insufficiently explored. Here, we systematically investigate
the morphological, structural, and optical properties of CsPbBr$_3$ thin films
prepared by high-pressure recrystallization, in comparison with standard
non-recrystallized films. Optimized recrystallization at 300 bar produces
smooth, pinhole-free, single-phase 3D perovskite layers with sub-nanometer
roughness, while the film thickness is precisely tunable via precursor
concentration. The process enhances both grain and crystallite sizes, leading
to amplified spontaneous emission with a reduced excitation threshold and
improved photostability. Temperature-dependent X-ray diffraction further
reveals the orthorhombic--tetragonal--cubic phase transition, consistent with
single-crystal behavior. This study provides fundamental insights into
pressure-driven recrystallization and establishes a reproducible, scalable
approach for fabricating high-quality CsPbBr$_3$ films for optoelectronic
devices.

AI.tldr: 该研究系统分析了高压重结晶对CsPbBr3钙钛矿薄膜性能的影响，发现在300 bar压力下可获得高质量、无针孔、单相3D钙钛矿薄膜，显著改善了薄膜的光电性能。
AI.motivation: 全无机钙钛矿CsPbBr3具有优异的热稳定性和化学稳定性，但通过溶液法制备高质量薄膜仍具挑战性。现有添加剂或溶剂工程策略复杂且重现性差，需要探索更可靠的方法。
AI.method: 采用高压重结晶技术制备CsPbBr3薄膜，系统比较了重结晶与非重结晶薄膜的形貌、结构和光学性能，通过温度依赖性X射线衍射分析相变行为。
AI.result: 300 bar优化重结晶可制备表面光滑、无针孔、单相3D钙钛矿层，亚纳米级粗糙度，薄膜厚度可通过前驱体浓度精确调控。该过程增强了晶粒和晶粒尺寸，导致自发发射增强、激发阈值降低和光稳定性提高。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为压力驱动重结晶提供了基础见解，并建立了一种可重现、可扩展的方法来制备用于光电器件的高质量CsPbBr3薄膜。

title: Exact Mapping of Nonequilibrium to Equilibrium Phase Transitions for Systems in Contact with Two Thermal Baths
summary:
We show that a large class of nonequilibrium many-body systems in contact
with two thermal baths admit an exact mapping onto equivalent equilibrium
systems. This mapping provides direct access to nonequilibrium phase transition
points from known equilibrium results, irrespective of the model, interaction
topology, or distance from equilibrium. We verify the universality of this
correspondence using paradigmatic models (Ising, Potts, and Blume-Capel), and
highlight distinctive features in entropy production close to critical and
tricritical points. Our findings connect equilibrium and nonequilibrium
statistical mechanics, with implications for microscopic thermal machines and
stochastic thermodynamics.

AI.tldr: 该论文展示了一大类与两个热浴接触的非平衡多体系统可以精确映射到等效的平衡系统，从而能够从已知的平衡结果直接获得非平衡相变点。
AI.motivation: 连接平衡和非平衡统计力学，为理解非平衡相变提供新视角，并对微观热机和随机热力学有重要意义。
AI.method: 建立非平衡多体系统到等效平衡系统的精确映射方法，使用典型模型（Ising、Potts和Blume-Capel模型）验证该映射的普适性。
AI.result: 验证了该对应关系的普适性，不受模型、相互作用拓扑或与平衡距离的影响，并揭示了在临界点和三临界点附近熵产生的独特特征。
AI.conclusion: 该映射方法成功连接了平衡和非平衡统计力学，为研究非平衡相变提供了新工具，对微观热机和随机热力学领域有重要影响。

title: Non-adiabatic perturbation theory of the exact factorisation
summary:
We present a novel nonadiabatic perturbation theory (NAPT) for correlated
systems of electrons and nuclei beyond the Born-Oppenheimer (BO) approximation.
The essence of the method is to exploit the smallness of the
electronic-to-nuclear mass ratio by treating the electron-nuclear correlation
terms in the electronic equation of motion of the exact factorisation (EF)
framework as perturbation. We prove that any finite-order truncation of the
NAPT preserves the normalisation of the conditional electronic factor as well
as the gauge covariance of the resulting perturbative equations of motion. We
illustrate the usefulness of NAPT by obtaining nonadiabatic corrections to the
BO Berry phase in Jahn--Teller systems with a conical intersection. It well
captures the departure of the exact Berry phase from being topological via the
lowest-order NAPT. By removing the conical intersection with a constant gap, it
further yields the correct scaling of the Berry phase toward zero.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种新的非绝热微扰理论(NAPT)，用于处理超出玻恩-奥本海默近似的电子-核关联系统，通过将电子-核关联项作为微扰处理，并证明了该理论保持规范协变性和归一化条件。
AI.motivation: 玻恩-奥本海默近似在处理电子-核强关联系统时存在局限性，需要发展超越该近似的理论方法来准确描述非绝热效应。
AI.method: 基于精确因子化框架，将电子-核质量比的小量作为微扰参数，对电子运动方程中的电子-核关联项进行微扰展开。
AI.result: NAPT能够准确捕捉Jahn-Teller系统中锥形交叉点附近的非绝热修正，包括贝里相位的非拓扑性偏离，并在去除锥形交叉点时给出贝里相位趋近于零的正确标度行为。
AI.conclusion: NAPT为处理强关联电子-核系统提供了一种有效的微扰理论框架，能够系统地计算非绝热修正并保持理论的自洽性。

title: Theoretical analysis of photon detection mechanism in superconducting single-photon detectors
summary:
To elucidate the photon detection mechanism of superconducting single-photon
detectors, we theoretically examine the dynamics of type-II superconductors
with a bias current using the two-dimensional time-dependent Ginzburg-Landau
and the Maxwell equations. The photon injection that weakens the
superconducting order parameter is treated phenomenologically as a local
temperature increase, and the amount of injection is controlled by the initial
hotspot radius. The photon is detected by the voltage change between two
electrodes attached to the left and right edges of the superconductor. We find
that certain parameter ranges can be explained by the traditionally considered
hotspot model, while other parameter ranges are governed by the generation and
annihilation of superconducting vortex and antivortex pairs. The photon
detection is possible for an initial hotspot radius that exceeds a threshold
value. We find that the generation of a vortex--antivortex pair occurs near the
threshold. The flow of the pair perpendicular to the current direction finally
creates a normal region for the photon detection. The voltage change for the
Ginzburg--Landau parameter close to the transition point from type-II to type-I
superconductor shows anomalous behavior that is not associated with the
dynamics of the vortex--antivortex pair. We also examine the effects of
spatially non-uniform current density on the voltage change and the
superconducting order parameter to provide a hint to understand the behavior of
wide-strip single-photon detectors. The estimated values of incident photon
energy and response time for photon detection are reasonable in comparison with
experiments. The present comprehensive examination provides useful guidelines
for flexible design of device structures.

AI.tldr: 通过二维时变Ginzburg-Landau和Maxwell方程理论研究了超导单光子探测器的光子检测机制，发现光子检测可通过热点模型和涡旋-反涡旋对生成两种机制实现。
AI.motivation: 阐明超导单光子探测器的光子检测机制，理解不同类型超导体中光子检测的物理过程。
AI.method: 使用二维时变Ginzburg-Landau和Maxwell方程模拟II型超导体的动力学，将光子注入处理为局部温度升高，通过初始热点半径控制注入量。
AI.result: 发现光子检测存在阈值效应，当初始热点半径超过阈值时发生检测；在阈值附近出现涡旋-反涡旋对生成，其垂直于电流方向的运动最终形成正常区域；在接近II型到I型超导体转变点的参数下观察到异常行为。
AI.conclusion: 该综合研究为灵活设计器件结构提供了有用指导，估计的光子能量和响应时间与实验相符。

title: Embedding independent length scale of flat bands
summary:
In flat band systems with quenched kinetic energy, most of the conventional
length scales related to the band dispersion become ineffectual. Although a few
geometric length scales, such as the quantum-metric length, can still be
defined, because of their embedding dependence, i.e., the dependence on the
choice of orbital positions used to construct the tight-binding model, they
cannot serve as a universal length scale of the flat band systems. Here, we
introduce an embedding-independent length scale $\xi_\text{flat}$ of a flat
band that is defined as the localization length of an in-gap state proximate to
the flat band. Because $\xi_\text{flat}$ is derived from the intrinsic
localization of compact localized states, it is solely determined by the
Hamiltonian and provides a robust foundation for embedding-independent
observables. We show analytically that the superconducting coherence length in
a flat-band superconductor is given by $\xi_\text{flat}$ in the weak-coupling
limit, thereby identifying $\xi_\text{flat}$ as the relevant length scale for
many-body phenomena. Numerical simulations on various lattice models confirm
all theoretical predictions, including the correspondence between
$\xi_\text{flat}$ and the superconducting coherence length. Our results
highlight $\xi_\text{flat}$ as a universal length scale for flat bands and open
a pathway to embedding-independent characterization of strongly interacting
flat-band materials.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个嵌入无关的平带长度尺度ξ_flat，定义为平带附近带隙态的局域化长度，可作为平带系统的普适长度尺度。
AI.motivation: 在平带系统中，由于动能淬灭，传统的与能带色散相关的长度尺度失效。虽然可以定义一些几何长度尺度（如量子度量长度），但由于它们依赖于轨道位置选择（嵌入依赖性），无法作为平带的普适长度尺度。
AI.method: 引入嵌入无关的平带长度尺度ξ_flat，定义为平带附近带隙态的局域化长度。该尺度源于紧局域态的本征局域化特性，仅由哈密顿量决定。理论分析表明在弱耦合极限下，平带超导体的超导相干长度等于ξ_flat。
AI.result: 数值模拟验证了理论预测，包括ξ_flat与超导相干长度的对应关系。ξ_flat被确认为平带的普适长度尺度。
AI.conclusion: ξ_flat作为平带的普适长度尺度，为强相互作用平带材料的嵌入无关表征开辟了新途径。

title: Hybridization Gap and Edge States in Strain-layer InAs/In0.5Ga0.5Sb Quantum Spin Hall Insulator
summary:
The hybridization gap in strained-layer InAs/InxGa1-xSb quantum spin Hall
insulators (QSHIs) is significantly enhanced compared to binary InAs/GaSb QSHI
structures, where the typical indium composition, x, ranges between 0.2 and
0.4. This enhancement prompts a critical question: to what extent can quantum
wells (QWs) be strained while still preserving the fundamental QSHI phase? In
this study, we demonstrate the controlled molecular beam epitaxial (MBE) growth
of highly strained-layer QWs with an indium composition of x = 0.5. These
structures possess a substantial compressive strain within the In0.5Ga0.5Sb QW.
Detailed crystal structure analyses confirm the exceptional quality of the
resulting epitaxial films, indicating coherent lattice structures and the
absence of visible dislocations. Transport measurements further reveal that the
QSHI phase in InAs/In0.5Ga0.5Sb QWs is robust and protected by time-reversal
symmetry. Notably, the edge states in these systems exhibit giant
magnetoresistance when subjected to a modest perpendicular magnetic field. This
behavior is in agreement with the Z2 topological property predicted by the
Bernevig-Hughes-Zhang (BHZ) model, confirming the preservation of topologically
protected edge transport in the presence of enhanced bulk strain.

AI.tldr: 该研究展示了在高度应变层InAs/In0.5Ga0.5Sb量子阱中，量子自旋霍尔绝缘体相在增强的体应变下仍然保持拓扑保护的边缘输运。
AI.motivation: 研究旨在探索在应变层InAs/InxGa1-xSb量子自旋霍尔绝缘体中，量子阱能够承受多大程度的应变而仍能保持基本的QSHI相。
AI.method: 采用分子束外延控制生长具有x=0.5铟组分的高度应变层量子阱，进行详细的晶体结构分析和输运测量。
AI.result: 晶体结构分析显示外延薄膜质量优异，具有相干晶格结构且无可见位错。输运测量表明QSHI相在时间反演对称性保护下保持稳健，边缘态在垂直磁场下表现出巨大磁阻。
AI.conclusion: InAs/In0.5Ga0.5Sb量子阱中的QSHI相在增强的体应变下仍然保持，其Z2拓扑性质与BHZ模型预测一致，证实了拓扑保护的边缘输运的保持。

title: Schrödinger-invariance in phase-ordering kinetics
comment:
Latex2e, 13 pages, 3 figures. Conference proceedings LT-16, based on

summary:

non-equilibrium phase-ordering kinetics with ${z}=2$ is obtained from the
co-variance of the four-point response functions. Their non-equilibrium scaling
forms follow from a new non-equilibrium representation of the Schr\"odinger
algebra.

title: Signal attenuation and phase evolution evaluation under the influence of nonlinear gradient
summary:
Accurately analyzing NMR and MRI diffusion experimental data relies on the
theoretical expression used for signal attenuation or phase evolution. In a
complex system, the encountered magnetic field is often inhomogeneous, which
may be represented by a linear combination of z^n gradient fields, where n is
the order. Additionally, the higher the order of the nonlinear gradient field,
the more sensitive the phase variances are to differences in diffusion
coefficients and delay times. Hence, studying higher-order fields has both
theoretical and experimental importance, but this is a challenge for
traditional methods. The recently proposed phase diffusion method proposed a
general way to overcome the challenge. This method is used and demonstrated in
detail in this paper to determine the phase evolution in a quadric field (n =
4). Three different types of phase evolution in the quadric gradient field are
obtained. Moreover, a general signal attenuation expression is proposed to
describe the signal attenuation for spin diffusion from the origin of the
nonlinear gradient field. This approximation is based on the short gradient
pulse (SGP) approximation but is extended to include the finite gradient pulse
width (FGPW) effect by using the mean square phase. Compared to other forms of
signal attenuation, such as Gaussian and Lorentzian, this method covers a
broader range of attenuation, from small to relatively large. Additionally,
this attenuation is easier to understand than the Mittag-Leffler function-based
attenuation. The results, particularly the phase and signal attenuation
expressions obtained in this paper, potentially advance PFG diffusion research
in nonlinear gradient fields in NMR and MRI.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于相位扩散方法的通用信号衰减表达式，用于分析NMR和MRI中非线性梯度场下的扩散实验数据，特别针对四阶梯度场(n=4)进行了详细研究。
AI.motivation: 复杂系统中的磁场通常是非均匀的，高阶非线性梯度场对扩散系数和时间延迟的差异更敏感，但传统方法难以研究高阶场。
AI.method: 使用相位扩散方法分析四阶梯度场中的相位演化，提出基于短梯度脉冲近似但扩展包含有限梯度脉冲宽度效应的通用信号衰减表达式。
AI.result: 获得了四阶梯度场中三种不同类型的相位演化，提出了覆盖从小到大衰减范围的信号衰减表达式，比基于Mittag-Leffler函数的衰减更易理解。
AI.conclusion: 本文获得的相位和信号衰减表达式有望推动NMR和MRI中非线性梯度场下的PFG扩散研究。

title: Structure-property relation in the cuprates: a possible explanation for the pseudogap
summary:
We propose a structure-property relation that could be key to the pseudogap
phenomenology in cuprates. The underlying nonsymmorphic crystal structure in
the low-temperature orthogonal phase endows the lattice with a sublattice
structure that gives rise to two electronic bands near the Fermi surface. In
the presence of spin-orbit coupling, the hybridization of these two bands
generates small Fermi pockets and, correspondingly, a change in the number of
free carriers. A sublattice structure also leads to angle-resolved
photoemission spectroscopy (ARPES) matrix-element interference, naturally
explaining the emergence of Fermi arcs and their consistency with closed Fermi
pockets. We employ a symmetry analysis to highlight the expected Fermi surface
properties, and complement it with density functional theory (DFT) for a
quantitative discussion and comparison with recent experiments in doped
La$_2$CuO$_4$. The proposed mechanism can consistently account for the most
salient features of the pseudogap in the cuprates, namely, the Fermi surface
reconstruction with the formation of small Fermi pockets and the corresponding
change in carrier density, and the observation of Fermi arcs by ARPES.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种基于非对称晶体结构的机制，解释了铜氧化物中赝隙现象的关键特征，包括费米面重构形成小费米口袋、载流子密度变化以及ARPES观测到的费米弧。
AI.motivation: 理解铜氧化物高温超导体中赝隙现象的物理起源，特别是费米面重构和费米弧观测等关键实验现象。
AI.method: 结合对称性分析和密度泛函理论(DFT)，研究低温正交相的非对称晶体结构及其对电子能带结构的影响，分析自旋轨道耦合导致的能带杂化效应。
AI.result: 非对称晶体结构产生的子晶格结构形成两个近费米面的电子能带，自旋轨道耦合杂化产生小费米口袋和载流子密度变化，子晶格结构还导致ARPES矩阵元干涉，自然解释费米弧现象。
AI.conclusion: 提出的结构-性质关系能够一致地解释铜氧化物赝隙现象中最显著的特征，包括费米面重构、载流子密度变化和费米弧观测。

title: Acoustic orbital Hall effect and orbital pumping in light-metal-ferromagnet bilayers
summary:
Orbital currents provide a new degree of freedom for controlling magnetism,
yet their interaction with lattice dynamics remains largely unexplored. Here we
report a systematic investigation of the acoustic orbital Hall effect in light
metals such as Ti and Cr, where surface acoustic waves generate orbital
currents through phonon-orbital coupling. The acoustic orbital current in Ti
exhibits higher efficiency and longer diffusion length compared to the acoustic
spin current in Pt. The sign and magnitude of the rectified acoustic voltages
in nonmagnetic (Ti, Cr)/ferromagnetic (Ni, Co, Fe$_x$Co$_{1-x}$) bilayers are
determined by the product of orbital-to-spin conversion and magnetoelastic
coupling efficiencies of the ferromagnet. Additionally, we find evidence for
acoustic orbital pumping, whereby the excitation of ferromagnetic resonance by
surface acoustic waves injects an orbital current from the ferromagnet into the
nonmagnet. These results establish lattice dynamics as an efficient driver of
orbital transport, opening opportunities for low-dissipation orbitronic devices
that harness and sense phonons.

AI.tldr: 研究发现声表面波可以通过声子-轨道耦合在轻金属中产生轨道电流，这种声学轨道霍尔效应比声学自旋电流效率更高、扩散距离更长，为低耗散轨道电子器件提供了新机会。
AI.motivation: 轨道电流为控制磁性提供了新的自由度，但其与晶格动力学的相互作用尚未被充分探索。
AI.method: 系统研究轻金属（如Ti和Cr）中的声学轨道霍尔效应，通过声表面波产生轨道电流，并分析非磁性/铁磁性双层结构中的整流声学电压。
AI.result: Ti中的声学轨道电流比Pt中的声学自旋电流效率更高、扩散距离更长；整流声学电压的符号和大小由轨道-自旋转换效率和铁磁体的磁弹性耦合效率决定；发现了声学轨道泵浦现象。
AI.conclusion: 晶格动力学是轨道输运的有效驱动机制，为利用和探测声子的低耗散轨道电子器件开辟了机会。

title: From data to design: Random forest regression model for predicting mechanical properties of alloy steel
summary:
This study investigates the application of Random Forest Regression for
predicting mechanical properties of alloy steel-Elongation, Tensile Strength,
and Yield Strength-from material composition features including Iron (Fe),
Chromium (Cr), Nickel (Ni), Manganese (Mn), Silicon (Si), Copper (Cu), Carbon
(C), and deformation percentage during cold rolling. Utilizing a dataset
comprising these features, we trained and evaluated the Random Forest model,
achieving high predictive performance as evidenced by R2 scores and Mean
Squared Errors (MSE). The results demonstrate the model's efficacy in providing
accurate predictions, which is validated through various performance metrics
including residual plots and learning curves. The findings underscore the
potential of ensemble learning techniques in enhancing material property
predictions, with implications for industrial applications in material science.
